a girl called Lily and a boy called Sam. Lily has plain unprinted Purple pants and a pink stripped torso that has a flower necklace. Her face is double sided with one side smiling and happy and the other is showing her having a little sleep, and her hair is just a common dark brown ponytail.

column1: Sam has plain unprinted dark blue pants and a Light azure hoodie with a stripped line and green shirt printed on the torso. Like Lily he has a double sided face one showing a smile with some freckles and the other showing a worried face with freckles, to top him off is another common hair piece a short dark nougat hair part.

There are 6 minifigure accessories and 1 human accessory. The six minifigure accessories are two yellow life jackets for Sam and Lily, a camera with a lens build, a 2x2 tan tile with a map print, a green briefcase and finally a 1x2 light gray tile with a smart phone print. There&rsquo

column1: Finally the small helicopter, this build is the largest in terms of length. The legs of the helicopter uses 4 parts two toolbar parts and 1x6 white plates. The cockpit of the helicopter has no internal decoration just enough space for two figures. The cockpit window is a trans light blue helicopter windshield part that is connected by two clips meaning the window can move up and down for more accessibility. The helicopters tail is a simple build using around 20 or so parts that has a small rotator and fin part. The copters blades are just 2 1x6 black plates with a round tile connecting them onto a rotating 2x2 plate. After building this your left with 47 spare parts.
